name: XA Pro 3D v8 Trail Running Shoes - Women's

features: 3D Mesh: 3D open Mesh provides maximum breathability.
Lace pocket: Provides easy storage for the Quicklace™ lacing system.
Protective toecap: A protective piece of rubber, leather or synthetic material over the toe area.
SensiFit™: SensiFit™ cradles the foot from the midsole to the lacing system, providing a secure, snug, and virtually customized fit all around the foot.
Welded upper: Stitch-free upper construction provides a smooth, glove-like, fit and feel.

Molded OrthoLite®: Molded to fit the inside of the shoe, this OrthoLite® insole provides superior cushioning, as well as breathability and durability, to upgrade the comfort and performance of the footwear.
Quicklace™: Minimalistic and strong lace for one-pull tightening. Easy-on, easy-off.
